channel.title: 计算机基础 on WANG, HENGYU
channel.description: Recent content in 计算机基础 on WANG, HENGYU

item.title: 五层协议
item.description: 计算机网络体系结构 计算机网络中有两种协议栈OSI协议和TCP/IP协议，为了方便我们中和了这两个协议的优点，采用五层协议的体系结构，这样既简洁，又清晰。 应用层 我截取麻省Computer Network中对于应用层的定义。 Sitting at Layer 7 – the very top of the Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) communications model – the application layer provides services for an application program to ensure that effective communication with another application program on a network is possible. The application layer should not be thought of as an application as most people understand it. Instead, the application layer is a component within an application that controls the communication method to other devices.
